name: Shoot Your Goo!
description:
Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2019. Game by myself and @Leonovsky75

Shoot Your Goo is a 3D puzzle platformer where you play with Only One button. The game features plenty of challenging levels , pleasant visuals and great music. Chase after Diamond medals by figuring out the way to Shoot Your Goo with the least amount of strokes.
